entry.def: A wagtail is a type of small bird which moves its tail quickly up and down as it walks.

means.word_mean: 1. Old World bird having a very long tail that jerks up and down as it walks

auth_sentence.content: Spare my grey beard, you wagtail?

auth_sentence.content: Grey wagtail Grey wagtails are energetic little birds and always on the move; frantically bobbing, ducking and dashing about.
